name: Raid Sword*Caliburs
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. of a dualsword will increase more significantly than that of one-handed or fist weapon. When enchanted to 4 or more, Accuracy will increase by 4

name: Raid Sword*Sword of Limit
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. of a dualsword will increase more significantly than that of one-handed or fist weapon. When enchanted to 4 or more, P. Atk. will increase by 146 on a critical attack

name: Raid Sword*Sword of Delusion
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. of a dualsword will increase more significantly than that of one-handed or fist weapon. When enchanted to 4 or more, Max HP will increase by 25%

description: When enchanted, P. Atk. of a dualsword will increase more significantly than that of one-handed or fist weapon. When enchanted to 4 or more, critical will increase by 65

name: Mark of Challenger
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Challenger. An item for occupational change

name: Letter of Kash
description: Kash's introduction letter. Take this letter to Martien in Town of Giran

name: Watcher's 1st Eye
description: An item obtained from the monster, Gorr. Take this to Martien in Town of Giran

name: Watcher's 2nd Eye
description: An item obtained from the monster, Baraham. Show this to Raldo and..

name: Scroll of Shyslassys
description: An ancient scroll obtained by slaying Shyslassys. Take this to Kash in the Town of Dion

name: Broken Key
description: A key obtained by slaying Shyslassys. This key is needed in order to open the Chest of Shyslassys

name: Mark of Duty
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of Duty. An item for occupational change

name: Letter of Dustin
description: A letter given by Dustin. Deliver the letter to Grand Master Hannavalt in Town of Giran

name: Knight's Tear
description: Obtained from the spirit of Sir Herod. Take this to Sir Aaron Tanford

name: Mirror of Orpic
description: This is needed in order to speak with the ghost of Sir Talianus. Use this to defeat the hangman tree

name: Tear of Confession
description: Obtained from the ghost of Sir Talianus. Take this to Sir Kiel Nighthawk

name: Report Piece
description: You may obtain this by hunting strains and ghouls. Gather 10 pieces and put them together to create Talianus's report

name: Report Piece
description: The completed report. After speaking with Sir Kiel Nighthawk, deliver the report to the ghost of Sir Talianus

name: Tear of Loyalty
description: This item can be obtained from Isael Silvershadow. Take it to Priest Dustin

name: Militas Article
description: You can receive this item when you catch a Leto lizardman. Collect 20 of them and take them to Isael Silvershadow

name: Saints Ashes Urn
description: An object received from Priest Dustin. Deliver this to Sir Windawood

name: Athebaldt's Skull
description: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's ribs and Athebaldt's shin

name: Athebaldt's Ribs
description: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's skull and Athebaldt's shin

name: Athebaldt's Shin
description: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's ribs and Athebaldt's skull

name: Letter of Windawood
description: A letter received from Sir Colin Windawood. Show this to Priest Dustin

name: Dufners Letter
description: A letter sent from Master Dufner to Master Terry in the Town of Dion

name: Terry's 1st Order
description: Investigate the neer ghoul berserkers of the Execution Grounds

name: Terry's 2nd Order
description: Investigate the Ol Mahum captain, Turek orc warlord, ant captain and Turak bugbear warrior

name: Terry's Letter
description: A letter sent by Master Terry to Trader Viktor of Hunters Village

name: Viktor's Letter
description: A letter sent by Trader Viktor to Master Terry in the Town of Dion. The letter has Terry's seal

name: Hawkeye's Letter
description: A letter sent by Hawkeye to Trader Viktor of the Hunters Village

name: Mysterious Spirit Ore
description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying neer ghoul berserkers. Take this to Master Terry

name: Ol Mahum Spirit Ore
description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the Ol Mahum captain. Take this to Master Terry

name: Turek Spirit Ore
description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the Turek orc overlord. Take this to Master Terry

name: Ant Spirit Ore
description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the ant captain. Take this to Master Terry

name: Turak Bugbear Spirit Ore
description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the Turak bugbear warrior. Take this to Master Terry

name: Terry's Box
description: A chest containing the mysterious Spirit Ore. Take this to Trader Viktor of the Hunters Village

name: Viktor's Request
description: A request issued by Trader Viktor. "Please gather 10 medusa scales."\0

name: Medusa Scales
description: The scales of the medusa. Gather 10 of these and take them to Trader Viktor

name: Shilen's Spirit Ore
description: Strange Spirit Ore obtained from the bodies of mutant species. They seem to be related to Shilen, the goddess of death

name: Analysis Request
description: A request letter sent to Magister Marina of the Ivory Tower from Trader Viktor. The letter asks Marina to analyze the dark bezoar

name: Marina's Letter
description: A letter sent by Magister Marina to Blacksmith Brunon of the Dwarven Village

name: Experiment Tools
description: Experimental tools crafted by Blacksmith Brunon. Deliver these to Magister Marina of the Ivory Tower

name: Analysis Result
description: A document where Magister Marina has organized the analyzed results of the Dark Bezoar. Deliver this to Master Terry in the Town of Dion

name: Terry's 3rd Order
description: Master Terry's orders. The orders give instructions to come back for the next task after reaching level 36

name: List of Host
description: A list of the bezoar hosts. "Marsh stakato drone, Breka orc overlord, ant warrior captain, Leto lizardman warrior"\0

name: Abyss Spirit Ore
description: The dark bezoar retrieved from the body of a marsh stakato drone. Take this to Master Terry

name: Abyss Spirit Ore
description: The Spirit Ore retrieved from the body of the Breka orc overlord. Take this to Master Terry

name: Abyss Spirit Ore
description: The Spirit Ore retrieved from the body of the ant captain. Take this to Master Terry

name: Abyss Spirit Ore
description: The Spirit Ore retrieved from the body of the Leto lizardman warrior. Take this to Master Terry

name: Terry's Report
description: A report detailing information about the Spirit Ore incident. Take this to Master Dufner of Town of Giran

name: Mark of Seeker
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Seeker. An occupation change related item

name: Mark of Scholar
description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Scholar. An occupation change related item

name: Mirien's 1st Sigil
description: A mark given by Magister Mirien while giving orders to complete High Priest Sylvain's request

name: Mirien's 2nd Sigil
description: A mark given by Magister Mirien while giving orders to complete Grand Magister Jurek's request

name: Mirien's 3rd Sigil
description: A mark given by Magister Mirien when giving orders to complete Elder Cronos's request

name: Mirien's Instruction
description: A note that contains Magister Mirien's instructions. The note gives instructions to come back for the next task after reaching level 36

name: Maria's 1st Letter
description: A letter sent by Maria to Captain Lucas in the Town of Dion

name: Maria's 2nd Letter
description: A letter sent by Maria to Astrologer Creta of the village of Floran

name: Lucas's Letter
description: A letter sent by Captain Lucas in the Town of Dion to Maria

name: Lucilla's Handbag
description: The handbag left by Maria's friend Lucillas on the night of the theft. Take this to Astrologer Creta

name: Creta's 1st Letter
description: A letter sent by the Astrologer Creta to Maria in the Town of Dion

name: Creta's Painting1
description: A painting by Astrologer Creta. It contains a shadow presumed to be that of the thief. Take this to Maria

name: Creta's Painting2
description: A painting by Astrologer Creta. It contains a shadow presumed to be that of the thief. Take this to Captain Lucas

name: Creta's Painting3
description: A painting painted by Astrologer Creta. The shadow in the painting is that of a Leto lizardman warrior

name: Brown Scroll Scrap
description: A scrap of a scroll that contains directions on how to create the crystal of purity. Gather 5 of these and take them to Maria

name: Crystal of Purity
description: A crystal used to purify the earth. Take this to High Priest Sylvain in the Town of Dion

name: High Priest's Sigil
description: A mark received from High Priest Sylvain. A proof given to those who are carrying out the orders of the High Priest

name: Grand Magister's Sigil
description: A mark received from Grand Magister Jurek. A proof given to those who are carrying out the orders of the Grand Magister

name: Crono's Sigil
description: A mark received from Elder Cronos. This signifies proof that someone is carrying out orders from Elder Cronos

name: Sylvain's Letter
description: High Priest Sylvain's letter. Take this to Maria in the Town of Dion

name: Symbol of Sylvain
description: A symbol given to those who have passed High Priest Sylvain's test. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion

name: Jurek's List
description: The list of evil creatures that Grand Magister Jurek asked you to investigate: Monster eye destroyer, Breka orc shaman, and shackle

name: Monster Eye Destroyer's Skin
description: A beamer's skin. Gather 5 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek of Town of Giran

name: Shaman's Necklace
description: A Breka orc shaman's necklace. Gather 5 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek in Town of Giran

name: Shackle's Scalp
description: Skin of the shackle's head. Gather 2 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek of Town of Giran

name: Symbol of Jurek
description: A symbol given to those who have passed Grand Magister Jurek's test. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion

name: Cronos Letter
description: A letter sent by Elder Cronos to Magister Dieter in the Town of Giran
